metadata.description: Various life improvement plugins for Claude Code

plugins.name: claude-expert
plugins.description: Expert knowledge system for Claude Code with complete documentation database, intelligent search, and automatic CLI management. Provides authoritative answers to all Claude Code questions using official documentation.

plugins.name: perplexity
plugins.description: Real-time web search, reasoning, and research through Perplexity's API via MCP server

plugins.name: playwright
plugins.description: Browser automation and testing with Playwright via MCP server

plugins.name: baseline
plugins.description: Ensures optimal Claude Code defaults and validates required tools. Includes custom statusline and recommended settings.

plugins.name: transcript
plugins.description: Parse and analyze Claude Code session transcripts with beautiful HTML output. List transcripts, generate reports, and explore conversation history.

plugins.name: wsl-ssh-agent
plugins.description: Bridges Windows SSH agent to WSL for SSH/SCP/Git operations. Works with 1Password, native Windows OpenSSH, and other SSH agent implementations.

plugins.name: mcp-rest-api
plugins.description: REST API tester MCP server - test HTTP endpoints directly from Claude Code

plugins.name: generate-image
plugins.description: AI image generation using various models. Generate high-quality images from text descriptions.
